description:

Carsten struggled to nut in this video. He was and is willing to do an oral video, but both of us are a little leery that he will come all the way back and we film an entire BJ video with no ending. Certainly, neither Ransom or I could keep the brutal jack-hammering technique he uses to make himself nut!
I think he is dang sexy, but we are gonna table the oral video until we can be sure we can get a good ending....or bionic arms!
title: Carsten - Solo
